subject: Football
Bars
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Cave Creek, Ariz., is home to the Buffalo Chip Saloon, which bills itself as the best Packers bar in the state, and to Harold’s Cave Creek Corral, known by Steelers fans as Heinz Field West.
snippet: Cave Creek, Ariz., is home to the Buffalo Chip Saloon, which bills itself as the best Packers bar in the state, and to Harold’s Cave Creek Corral, known by Steelers fans as Heinz Field West.
